Title: Amber Enterprises shares in focus amid clarification on demerger buzz
Summary: Amber Enterprises clarified it's not considering demerging its electronics division, despite market speculation, and reported strong Q2FY25 growth, with shares closing higher amid positive market sentiment.

Title: Why Amber Enterprises Share Price is Rising
Summary: Amber Enterprises, a key player in India's growing electronics sector, saw a 30% stock rally amid demerger speculation and strategic growth initiatives, positioning itself for long-term expansion in consumer durables and other sectors.

Title: Amber Enterprises India Stock Declines 3.03% but Remains Near 52-Week High
Summary: Amber Enterprises India stock dropped 3.03% but remains near its 52-week high, outperforming the Sensex with a 17.82% increase over the past month despite high volatility.

Title: Amber Enterprises India - At multi-year highs: These 3 stocks witness 5-year swing high breakouts
Summary: Three stocks - Shakti Pumps, Amber Enterprises, and Newgen Software - hit 5-year swing highs on December 26, potentially indicating bullish trends in these counters with market caps over Rs 1000 crore.

Title: Amber Enterprises shares soar nearly 9% to record high amid demerger, IPO buzz
Summary: Amber Enterprises shares hit all-time high, surging 8.6% on reports of potential electronics division demerger and IPO, following strong Q2FY25 performance and positive technical indicators.
